location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to George Brown, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy and translation of a communication from Mahomed Kaun Zumboraechee Burbee to William Bruce, which informed the Resident of the great service the artificers (carpenters and ironsmiths) have provided in repariing the ordinance carriages damaged while being transported from Bushire. It further lists the tools that have been lost on the road during the course of this work.
